title: Set up Go module and project structure
notes: go mod init, create cmd/tlog/main.go, internal/tlog/ package structure

title: Define core data types
notes: Event struct (ID, Timestamp, Type, payload fields), Task struct (computed state), EventType constants (create/status/dep/block/update)

title: Implement storage layer
notes: get_tlog_root(), require_tlog(), append_event() to daily JSONL, load_all_events() with chronological sort

title: Implement state computation
notes: compute_state() - replay events to build task map, get_ready_tasks() - filter open tasks with satisfied deps and no blockers

title: Implement init command
notes: Create .tlog/ directory with config.json and events/ subdirectory

title: Implement create command
notes: Generate ID (tl-XXXXXXXX via SHA256), create event with title/deps/blocks/labels/notes, append to daily JSONL

title: Implement done/reopen commands
notes: Status change events, verify task exists before updating

title: Implement update command
notes: Update title, notes, labels via update event type

title: Implement list/show/ready commands
notes: list: filter by status (open/done/all), show: single task detail with dep status, ready: get_ready_tasks()

title: Implement dep/block commands
notes: Add/remove dependencies and blocking relationships via dep/block event types

title: Implement graph command
notes: build_dependency_graph(), output JSON or Mermaid format

title: Implement prime command
notes: Generate condensed context for AI agents: summary, ready_tasks, recent_completed, blocked_tasks

title: Implement sync command
notes: Git integration via os/exec: git add .tlog/ && git commit

title: Wire up CLI with cobra or stdlib flag
notes: Subcommand routing, argument parsing, JSON output helpers (output_json, error_json)

title: Add tests for core logic
notes: Test compute_state(), get_ready_tasks(), event append/load, ID generation

title: Update documentation for Go version
notes: Update README.md installation instructions, update AGENTS.md if needed

title: Test task 1
notes: First test task

title: Add justfile following agentic-code-reviewer pattern
notes: See ../agentic-code-reviewer for pattern

title: Add version command to tlog Go CLI
notes: Follow acr pattern for version embedding

title: Remove tlog.py Python implementation
notes: Go port is complete, remove Python version

title: Add prefix ID matching
notes: ResolveID() function that matches partial IDs (e.g., '6cb1' → 'tl-6cb11611'). Error if ambiguous. Apply to all commands that accept IDs.

title: Add archive/unarchive commands
notes: New 'archive' event type. tlog archive <id>, tlog unarchive <id>. Exclude archived from list/ready by default, --all flag to show.

title: Add reverse dependency view
notes: Enhance 'tlog show' to include blocks/blocked_by arrays. Optionally add 'tlog blocks <id>' and 'tlog blocked-by <id>' commands.

title: Add tlog edit command
notes: Opens $EDITOR with task as YAML/JSON, applies diff as update event. Convenience over tlog update --title/--notes flags.

title: Improve CLI consistency
notes: Align dep/block commands with create flags: 'tlog dep <id> --on <other>' instead of positional. Add --rm flag for removal.

title: Add tlog compact command
notes: Rewrite .tlog/events/* to single snapshot of current state. One create event per live task. Optional archive of old events.

title: Add status distinction for wontfix/rejected
notes: Currently only open/done. Need way to mark tasks as rejected/wontfix vs completed. Options: add status values, use labels, or add resolution field.
Implemented resolution field
Covered by done --wontfix, unnecessary complexity
YAGNI - repo is new, event log is tiny. Revisit when history becomes a problem.
Bikeshedding. Current syntax is fine and more concise.

title: Add batch task creation command
notes: Allow creating multiple interconnected tasks in a single command with symbolic references that resolve to real IDs. JSON input format. LOW PRIORITY - needs quorum from multiple agents on value vs. bash chaining workaround.

title: Design batch creation JSON input format
notes: Define JSON schema for batch task creation: symbolic refs, title, notes, deps, blocks, labels. Consider error handling semantics (atomic vs partial).

title: Implement batch creation command
notes: Add 'tlog batch' or 'tlog create --batch' command. Parse JSON input, resolve symbolic refs to generated IDs, create all tasks, return ID mapping.

title: Add tests for batch creation
notes: Test: valid batch with deps, invalid refs, partial failure handling, empty batch, circular deps detection.

title: Separate description and notes fields
notes: Description: mutable field for 'what is this task now'. Notes: append-only log for 'what happened'. Reflects different access patterns for AI agents.

title: Define description/notes field semantics
notes: Design decisions: description overwrite semantics, notes append semantics, handling of existing tasks (migration?), CLI flags naming.

title: Add description field to types
notes: Update Event and Task structs in types.go. Description field on create events, update events can modify description.

title: Update create command for --description
notes: Add --description flag to create command. Separate from --notes.

title: Update update command: description overwrites, notes appends
notes: Key change: --notes should append to existing notes (with timestamp?), --description should overwrite. May need to load current state before appending.

title: Update show/list output for both fields
notes: Display description and notes separately in show output. Consider truncation for list view.

title: Add tests for description/notes separation
notes: Test: create with description, update description overwrites, notes append behavior, show displays both, migration of existing tasks.

title: Add tlog labels command
notes:
Show all labels in use + recommended conventions. Helps agents discover existing taxonomy before creating tasks.

Recommended labels:
- priority:backlog|low|medium|high|critical
- type:feature|bug|refactor|chore
- needs:review|discussion|design|human

Freeform feature:<name> for grouping (not enumerated).

title: Fix tlog sync -m flag to use custom commit message
notes: Currently tlog sync -m 'message' ignores the message and uses default 'tlog: sync tasks'. Should pass the message to git commit.

Show all labels in use + recommended conventions. Helps agents discover existing taxonomy before creating tasks.

Recommended labels:
- priority:backlog|low|medium|high|critical
- type:feature|bug|refactor|chore
- needs:human-review|agent-review|discussion|design

Freeform feature:<name> for grouping (not enumerated).

Philosophy: lightweight markers only. No workflow features. Unix-y - do one thing well.
Fixed: main.go now accepts both -m and --message flags for sync command
Implemented: tlog labels shows in_use labels and recommended conventions

title: Add tlog claim command for in_progress status
notes:
New status: in_progress (open → in_progress → done)

Commands:
- tlog claim <id> [--note]: marks task as in_progress
- tlog unclaim <id>: reverts to open (or reuse reopen)

Behavior changes:
- tlog ready: excludes in_progress tasks
- tlog list --status in_progress: shows claimed work
- tlog done: works from in_progress state

No agent identity tracking - just status change.
Implementing claim command
Implemented claim command with in_progress status
Implemented description/notes separation with append semantics for notes
Semantics: description overwrites, notes appends (newline separated)
Added Description field to Event and Task structs in types.go
Added --description flag to create command
Update command: --description overwrites, --notes appends
Show output displays both description and notes fields
Existing tests pass, manual testing verified all semantics

title: Add unclaim command to release tasks back to open
description: Allow agents to release a claimed task without marking done
notes: If an agent claims a task and hits a blocker, they should be able to release it back to open. Using reopen feels semantically wrong since the task was never done.

title: Support --status in_progress in list command
description: Allow filtering to see actively claimed tasks
notes: Currently list accepts open|done|all but not in_progress. Useful for seeing what work is underway.

title: Add --label flag to list command for filtering
description: Filter tasks by label without parsing JSON
notes: Something like 'tlog list --label priority:high' to find tasks by label directly.
Testing the feature

title: Fix version display showing v0.0.2 when only v0.0.1 tag exists
description: go install shows pseudo-version v0.0.2-0.20260115185144-32db4baba86b instead of reflecting actual tag
notes: debug.ReadBuildInfo() returns Go pseudo-version which auto-increments patch. Need to investigate options: use git describe, hardcode version, or accept Go's behavior.

title: Add goreleaser for automated releases
description: Automate GitHub releases with pre-built binaries on tag push
notes: Would build multi-platform binaries and create GitHub releases automatically. Low priority since go install works fine for agent users.

title: Remove blocks, keep only deps
description: Simplify relationship model by removing blocks. Having both deps and blocks is redundant - they express the same ordering constraint from opposite directions. Keeping only deps is simpler and matches most task systems.

notes: Fixed graph to render blocks relationships. However, identified that having both deps and blocks is confusing - they're redundant. Created tl-6d58a6ca to remove blocks.
Starting implementation

Removed blocks from: types.go (Event, Task), state.go (ComputeState, GetReadyTasks, BuildDependencyGraph), commands.go (CmdCreate, CmdShow, CmdBlock, FormatDependencyTree), main.go (create flags, block command), and tests.
